title: [K-12] Educational Computational Chemistry (ECC) Teacher Training: Technology Integration Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry theory and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Industry-linked teacher training program conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform molecular structure analysis projects using computational chemistry simulation tools with 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop three or more digital activities linked to chemistry curricula based on the TPASK framework for instructional design.
Learners can create two chemistry concept explanation materials using mobile-friendly interactive content authoring tools.
Learners improve collaborative problem-solving skills by providing five or more project feedbacks through a peer assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
